simpletomb.config.allow_beyond_the_grave: Allows players to be hurt by special damages related to some items
simpletomb.config.auto_equip_on_death_re: Automatically equips any equipable items when respawning after a death
simpletomb.config.chance_loss_on_death.t: The chance that some items are lost on death
simpletomb.config.chance_mob_on_grave_re: The chance that creatures appear after the contents of a grave are retrieved
simpletomb.config.decay_time.tooltip: The time in minutes before a Grave's Key isn't required to open a grave (-1 = disabled)
simpletomb.config.ghostly_shape_duration: The duration of the Ghostly Shape effect in seconds
simpletomb.config.grave_key_on_death.too: Whether to always give players a Grave's Key on death
simpletomb.config.graves_by_pass_griefin: Whether graves should be allowed to bypass anti-griefing rules
simpletomb.config.log_player_grave.toolt: Whether to log the positions of players' graves
simpletomb.config.nerf_ghostly_shape.too: Whether to cancel the Ghostly Shape effect on breaking a block or opening a chest
The percentage of items that are lost on death
simpletomb.config.persistant_halloween.t: The Halloween features also happen outside the dates of the event
simpletomb.config.player_grave_access.to: Whether to require a Grave's Key to access graves
simpletomb.config.prevent_death_outside_: Prevents death outside of world borders
simpletomb.config.pvp_mode.tooltip: Enables PvP mode, which allows players to open graves of players they kill
simpletomb.config.sniffer_range.tooltip: The radius in which items should be collected when a grave is spawned
simpletomb.config.unhandled_beneficial_e: Beneficial effects that can't used by certain features such as ï¿½nkh of pray, lollipop, scroll of preservation, alchemy perk and magic siphon enchantment
simpletomb.config.unhandled_harmful_effe: Harmful effects that can't used by certain features such as tablet of cupidity and the enchantment plague bringer
simpletomb.config.whitelist_blocks.toolt: Blocks that can be replaced by graves
simpletomb.configuration.chat.tooltip: If true, send a player chat message every time a tomb is placed
simpletomb.configuration.creative.toolti: If creative mode players can teleport to the tomb with the key, ignoring distance
simpletomb.configuration.enabled.tooltip: Whether to handle player death at all (false will disable almost the entire mod)
simpletomb.configuration.extra_items.too: The radius in which extra bonus items should be hunted for and collected when a grave is spawned; set to zero (0) to disable
simpletomb.configuration.given.tooltip: Whether to give a Grave Key item to the player on death.  Tomb can be opened without they key, but the key will help the player locate the grave
simpletomb.configuration.log.tooltip: If true, write to the game log (server log) every time a tomb is placed
simpletomb.configuration.named.tooltip: If a key is being dropped, will the player's display name be added to the tomb key item name
simpletomb.configuration.openOnUse.toolt: True means the key will open the grave on use, even if the player is not standing on top
simpletomb.configuration.search_height.t: When searching for a grave location, this is the maximum height to check
simpletomb.configuration.search_range.to: When searching for a grave location, this is the maximum range to check
simpletomb.configuration.survival.toolti:
When survival player is within this (straight line calculated) distance from the tomb, they can teleport to the tomb.
 Set as zero (0) to disable survival TP feature.
 Set as negative one (-1) to allow survival teleportation always and ignore the distance (within dimension)
simpletomb.configuration.title: Simple Tomb Config
simpletomb.message.fail_to_place_grave: The grave could not be placed!
simpletomb.message.no_grave_location: Your items lie on the ground; this place is not intended for graves
simpletomb.message.no_loot_for_grave: No grave appeared as there were no items to be stored
simpletomb.message.no_place_for_grave: There was nowhere to place the grave!
simpletomb.message.open_grave.need_owner: Only the graves owner can open this
simpletomb.message.recover_lost_items: You have recovered your lost items
